text: Per Jimmie Åkesson (born May 17, 1979) is a Swedish politician and blogger.He has been the leader of the Sweden Democrats since 2005. In 2010 the Sweden Democrats made it into the Riksdag after the general elections. After the election in 2022 SD had 20% of the votes and is Swedens second biggest party (2024). ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish bloggers Category:Swedish politicians
title: Jimmie Åkesson
